title: SolarWinds Orion Platform UpdateActionsProperties Incorrect Behavior Order Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of SolarWinds Orion Platform. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the UpdateActionsProperties method. The issue results from input validation being performed too late in a sequence of operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of NETWORK SERVICE.
addtionnal_details: SolarWinds has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.solarwinds.com/trust-center/security-advisories/cve-2023-33224
timeline:
2023-05-11 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-07-27 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Piotr Bazydlo (@chudypb) of Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative
